evidence_example.title: CCP_demo
evidence_example.long_descr: CCP_demo: A minimal CCP demo using MPC5643L evaluation board. The voltage in the potentiometer output of the Evaluation Board can be monitored by using CCP. A correct sequence of CCP commands can be found in readme.txt file. Another useful resource is the file "PCAN_CCP_TEST_LEOPARD_ADC.xmt". This is a PCAN-View profile configuration to send ALL CCP command necessary to test the demo. The implementation of CCP provided by the ECU is also supported by and succesfully tested under other CCP commercial tools. The demo uses the following peripherals: ADC, PWM, CAN and CTU The demo is configured as BCC1 kernel
